title: Khloe Kardashian Ends Divorce Proceedings Against Lamar Odom
text: Khloe Kardashian Ends Divorce Proceedings Against Lamar Odom By MICHAEL ROTHMAN AND VANESSA WILKINS Oct 21, 2015, 4:08 PM ET 0 Shares WATCH Lamar Odom Shows Signs of Improvement 0 Shares Email Khloe Kardashian's legal team has called off her divorce proceedings with Lamar Odom, ABC News has confirmed. Kardashian's lawyer filed the dismissal today at the Mosk Courthouse, said Los Angeles County Superior Court PIO Mary Hearn. She filed for divorce in December 2013. Hearn said that after filing a dismissal, the divorce proceedings are automatically halted. “This is a very delicate and difficult time for both Lamar and Khloe, and the most sensible thing to do at such a time is not make any big moves and put everything on hold," said a source close to the situation. "So that’s what she is doing.” 0 Shares
